title: 日常交流基础
description: 简单日常对话，适合热身。
lines: Good morning, how are you today?
I would like a cup of tea, please.
Could you tell me the time, please?
Let's meet at the station at noon.
Thank you for your help, I appreciate it.

title: 旅行场景
description: 机场、酒店和出行的常见表达。
lines: Where can I check in for my flight?
The train to Oxford leaves from platform five.
I booked a double room for two nights.
Could you recommend a good local restaurant?
What time does breakfast start in the hotel?

title: 演讲与表达
description: 帮助你练习清晰表达和演讲节奏。
lines: Today I will share three key findings from our research.
First, we observed a significant increase in user engagement.
Second, the new design reduced support requests by half.
Finally, we plan to roll out the feature globally next quarter.
Thank you for your attention, and I look forward to your questions.

title: 求职面试
description: 用于模拟面试的高频问答。
lines: Could you introduce yourself briefly?
What motivated you to apply for this position?
Tell me about a challenge you solved in your previous role.
How do you prioritize tasks when deadlines conflict?
Where do you see your career progressing in the next five years?
